001package com.telos.loops.contacts;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
004import java.util.Map;
005
006/**
007 * Represents a contact in Loops.
008 *
009 * <p>A contact contains profile information, subscription status, and mailing list memberships.
010 * This is returned when finding or listing contacts.
011 *
012 * @param id the unique identifier for this contact
013 * @param email the contact's email address
014 * @param firstName the contact's first name
015 * @param lastName the contact's last name
016 * @param source how this contact was added (e.g., "API", "Import")
017 * @param subscribed whether the contact is subscribed to receive emails
018 * @param userGroup the user group this contact belongs to
019 * @param userId your application's unique identifier for this contact
020 * @param mailingLists map of mailing list IDs to subscription status (true if subscribed)
021 * @param optInStatus the contact's opt-in status (e.g., "single", "double", "none")
022 */
023@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = false)
024public record Contact(
025    String id,
026    String email,
027    String firstName,
028    String lastName,
029    String source,
030    Boolean subscribed,
031    String userGroup,
032    String userId,
033    Map<String, Boolean> mailingLists,
034    String optInStatus) {}
